Package me.ryandw11.ods

Class ObjectDataStructure

java.lang.Object
me.ryandw11.ods.ObjectDataStructure
public class ObjectDataStructure
extends java.lang.Object
The primary class of the ObjectDataStructure library.

  • Method Details

    • get

      public <T extends Tag<?>> T get​(java.lang.String name)
      Grab a tag based upon the name. TODO Look into ZLIB compression instead of gzip.

      This will not work with object notation see getObject(String) for that method.

      Ensure you are storing this result with the correct data type.

      Parameters:
      name - The name of the tag.
      Returns:
      The tag.

      This will return null if no tag with the name specified is found, or if the file does not exist.

    • getObject

      public <T> T getObject​(java.lang.String key)
      Grab a tag based upon an object key.

      This method allows you to directly get sub-objects with little overhead.

      getObject("primary.firstsub.secondsub");
      Parameters:
      key - The key to use.
      Returns:
      The object Tag.

      This will return null if the requested sub-object does not exist, or if the file does not exist.

    • getAll

      public java.util.List<Tag<?>> getAll()
      Get all of the tags in the file.
      Returns:
      All of the tags.

      This will return null if there are no tags, or if the file does not exist.

    • save

      public void save​(java.util.List<? extends Tag<?>> tags)
      Save tags to the file.

      This will overwrite the existing file. To append tags see append(Tag) and appendAll(List)

      Parameters:
      tags - The list of tags to save.

    • append

      public void append​(Tag<?> tag)
      Append tags to the end of the file.
      Parameters:
      tag - The tag to be appended.

    • appendAll

      public void appendAll​(java.util.List<Tag<?>> tags)
      Append a list of tags to the end of the file.
      Parameters:
      tags - The list of tags.

    • find

      public boolean find​(java.lang.String key)
      Find if a key exists within the file.
      Parameters:
      key - They key to find
      Returns:
      If the key exists.

    • delete

      public int delete​(java.lang.String key)
      Remove a tag from the list.
      Parameters:
      key - The key to remove.
      Returns:
      The index of where the data was deleted.

      This will return -1 if an error occurs. -1 will call if: The file does not exist, the requested key cannot be found, or the file cannot be read/edited.

    • replaceData

      public boolean replaceData​(java.lang.String key, Tag<?> replacement)
      Replace data with other data.

      Only works when there is no compression.

      Parameters:
      key - The key
      replacement - The data to replace
      Returns:
      If the replacement was successful.

    • getListData

      public static java.util.List<Tag<?>> getListData​(byte[] data) throws java.io.IOException
      Get the list of tags based upon bytes.

      This is meant for internal use only.

      Parameters:
      data - the array of bytes
      Returns:
      The List of tags.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - This method does not handle any of the possible IO Exceptions.
